mosinstall.name: VirtueMart LuckyPhoto Module
mosinstall.author: LuckyTeam
mosinstall.description: Shows the LuckyPhoto effect (LightBox variant) when clicking on product thumbnail

param.name: speed
param.label: Speed
param.description: The speed of the LuckyPhoto effect

param.name: bgcolor
param.label: Bgcolor
param.description: Background color of the LuckyPhoto effect

param.name: bgopacity
param.label: Bg opacity
param.description: Final background opacity of the LuckyPhoto effect

param.name: border
param.label: image border
param.description: Style of the image border of the LuckyPhoto effect

param.name: progress
param.label: preload image
param.description: Animated progress bar image, path is relative to Joomla URL

param.name: pages
param.label: Pages to show effect on
param.description: Select pages where this effect should be active

param.name: mode
param.label: Compatibility mode for some templates
param.description: try other mod e if current is not working with your template
